page.title: 08CLUBS CONTINUED
page.content: PLAY GROUP/ MUMS AND TODDLERS. Children have to be two before they can start at playgroup and they can stay there until they start school. The children make things and play together. The playgroup meets on three mornings a week. Some of the mothers help to run the group. Before the children go to playgroup they can go with their mothers to the Mums and Toddlers group. They play while the mothers talk and meet together. CUBS. BROWNIES. GUIDES. You have to be seven to go to Brownies and eight to be a Cub. You can go to Guides or Scouts when you are ten or eleven. You can make things and join in games. You can get badges if you work hard at particular things. Each group meets once a week.
